description:
Matsuda Yasuke is one of the main characters in the Danganronpa/Zero novel series.
Yasuke`s title is Ultimate Neurologist. He is in charge of the Hope`s Peak Academy`s Neurology lab. He is also one of the creators of the Neo World Program alongside http://anidb.net/ch51222 [Fujisaki Chihiro] and Gekkougahara Miaya.
name: Matsuda Yasuke
